alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:39PM CST until January 28 at 3:16AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Nezpique Near Basile Mermentau River Near Mermentau ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 945 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Des Cannes near Eunice. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.8 feet, it is estimated that 18 structures near the bayou will be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:15 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 20.0 feet early Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Bayou Des Cannes Eunice 16.0 15.5 Wed 9 pm CST 20.0 18.8 15.5 &&
